entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 05:52 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle and showers this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Drizzle and rain showers changing to a few flurries in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
